charges.charge_description: 21:843(a)(3) - UNLAWFUL POSSESSION OF A CONTROLLED SUBSTANCE BY FRAUD; 18:1028(a)(7) - FRAUD IN CONNECTION WITH IDENTIFICATION DOCUMENTS...
21:843(a)(3) - UNLAWFUL POSSESSION OF A CONTROLLED SUBSTANCE BY FRAUD...(1)

charges.charge_disposition: Committed to the custody of the Bureau of Prisons to be imprisoned for a term of 90 days concurrent with count 2. Upon release from imprisonment, the defendant shall be placed on supervised release for a term of 3 years concurrent with count 2 with standard and special conditions. $100.00 Special Assessment. $5000.00 Fine.

charges.charge_description: 18:1028(a)(7) - FRAUD IN CONNECTION WITH IDENTIFICATION DOCUMENTS...(2)

charges.charge_disposition: Committed to the custody of the Bureau of Prisons to be imprisoned for a term of 90 days concurrent with count 1. Upon release from imprisonment, the defendant shall be placed on supervised release for a term of 3 years concurrent with count 1 with standard and special conditions. $100.00 Special Assessment. $5000.00 Fine.
